WorkItem.Description:
I have following string, and I want to create HtmlNode from it: str="Hello colleagues,

Can you pls do something, something...
" When I call var node=HtmlNode.CreateNode(str); node have InnerHtml property set to: "Hello colleagues,", completely disregarding anything behind line break. Wouldn't expected behaviour be that node contains all text including line breaks?
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlNode.CreateNode(str) doesn't create node from whole text, only to first
